content:
Craft an item of type: acacia_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 35}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft an acacia_trapdoor, I need to place 6 acacia_planks in the crafting grid. I have 6 acacia_planks available in slot 40, so I will start by moving one of them to slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: acacia_trapdoor
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 35}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to place another acacia_plank in the crafting grid. I have 5 acacia_planks available in slot 40, so I will move one of them to slot 2 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
